name: Trisha Guha
review: My physical therapist is excellent! She is very friendly and helpful. Physio is absolutely outstanding. Thank you very much for your great, attentive service.

name: Ditipriya Chowdhury
review: All of the staff was fantastic! The care I received was impeccable. Great place! I also love the availability of the Fit Plan for continued support after my discharge.

name: Abdullah Al Mamun
review: Worked with her was wonderful, very professional, caring and prompt. My therapist was great, as were all of the aids!
